description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based web application, responsible for rendering the main App component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for React to manage rendering within a specified DOM element.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component used to highlight potential problems in an application during development.

methods.description: Method to render React elements into the DOM.
